body: {"market_description": "This market will resolve to 'Yes' if Cristiano Ronaldo reaches 100 million subscribers on his YouTube channel by September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If he does not reach this milestone by that date, the market will resolve to 'No'. The primary resolution source will be the current subscriber count shown on Ronaldo's official YouTube channel.", "market_question": "Will Ronaldo hit 100M YouTube subscribers by end of September?", "resolution_date": "2024-09-30T23:59:00"}
